org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.datanode.fsdataset.impl

Class FsDatasetCache

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.datanode.fsdataset.impl.FsDatasetCache

  • @InterfaceAudience.Private
@InterfaceStability.Unstable
public class FsDatasetCache
extends Object
    Manages caching for an FsDatasetImpl by using the mmap(2) and mlock(2) system calls to lock blocks into memory. Block checksums are verified upon entry into the cache.

      • usedBytesCount

        private final FsDatasetCache.UsedBytesCount usedBytesCount
        The approximate amount of cache space in use. This number is an overestimate, counting bytes that will be used only if pending caching operations succeed. It does not take into account pending uncaching operations. This overestimate is more useful to the NameNode than an underestimate, since we don't want the NameNode to assign us more replicas than we can cache, because of the current batch of operations.

      • maxBytes

        private final long maxBytes
        The total cache capacity in bytes.

      • numBlocksFailedToCache

        final AtomicLong numBlocksFailedToCache
        Number of cache commands that could not be completed successfully

      • numBlocksFailedToUncache

        final AtomicLong numBlocksFailedToUncache
